data.title: all the songs played in the hills
meta_keywords: the iconic journal of a nostalgia-obsessed bimbo
data.meta_description: a couple weeks ago, i made a post listing all the songs that were featured in all 3 szns of laguna beach: the real orange county . bc were living in this current era of streaming services, a lot of iconic shows from the 1990s and 2000s had their original soundtracks removed bc these network…
data.text:
a couple weeks ago, i made a post listing all the songs that were featured in all 3 szns of laguna beach: the real orange county. bc we're living in this current era of streaming services, a lot of iconic shows from the 1990s and 2000s had their original soundtracks removed bc these network companies didn't license the music 2 keep them in their shows, and i think that's just a bunch of bs as well as a massive injustice. many iconic scenes don't feel the same w/o the original music playing, and the tones of those scenes change bc of that.

so, just like i did w laguna beach and its original soundtrack from the og airings c. 2004-2006, i thought i'd do the same thing 4 its spin-off, the hills. like laguna beach, i'm going 2 b listing all the songs that were played in the og airings of the hills c. 2006-2010, all 6 szns.

this list will include most (if not all) of the songs that were featured in the og airings of the series, so if i missed any songs, like always, feel free 2 lmk!! anyway, let's get it started.

[ click 2 c the songs]

theme song:

natasha bedingfield - unwritten

songs played throughout the series:

vaughan penn - bring on the day (plays @ the beginning of each episode recapping the previous episode)

the black eyed peas - don't phunk with my heart (plays @ the end of almost each scene b4 cutting 2 commercial breaks)
